column4: ok, so i just reinstalled Ubuntu onto a Live-usb(8gb [7.5gb]) with a 3.4gb partition, but i cant seem to find the partition. any ideas?
ok, so i just reinstalled Ubuntu onto a Live-usb(8gb [7.5gb]) with a 3.4gb partition, but i cant seem to find the partition. any know where it is?
if you've booted it - you're in it
talk to their channel operators or ask for help in #freenode
